gov_title_zh: 不可能的任務：最終清算
writer: Bruce Geller, Christopher McQuarrie, Erik Jendresen
actors: Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames
plot: Hunt and the IMF pursue a dangerous AI called the Entity that's infiltrated global intelligence. With governments and a figure from his past in pursuit, Hunt races to stop it from forever changing the world.
